# About Me

As a Master’s student in Data Science with a foundation in public policy, I explore how data can be harnessed to address complex societal challenges. My work focuses on leveraging advanced analytics and machine learning to develop actionable insights that inform equitable, evidence-based policies. By bridging technical expertise with policy understanding, I aim to create innovative solutions that drive meaningful social impact.
